<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby & Wordpress Starter
</h1>
<p align="center">A starter for Headless Wordpress and Gatsby site using gatsby-source-wordpress and SCSS node-sass.</p>

## Info

This starter is using version 3 of gatsby-source-wordpress and node-sass@4.14.1.

It also requires a few things on the Wordpress side:

**Wordpress Plugins**

1. Advanced Custom Fields
2. Advanced Custom Fields to REST API
3. WP REST API Menus
4. This one is optional. Exposes Custom Logo to GraphQL -- WP REST API logo - plugin by Tom Phill - https://github.com/tomphill/wp-rest-api-logo

Kick off your project with this default boilerplate. This starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need to get up and running blazing fast with the blazing fast app generator for React.

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    Use the Gatsby CLI to create a new site, specifying the default starter.

    ```shell
    # create a new Gatsby site using the default starter
    gatsby new my-wordpress-gatsby-starter https://github.com/MichaelIrvine/wordpress-gatsby-starter
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

    ```shell
    cd my-wordpress-gatsby-starter/
    gatsby develop
    ```
